subject: Question regarding Simsonn VAM haptics
description_text:
Good morning

I have a SIMSONN Pro Plus Pedal, and am interested in acquiring the
SIMSONN VAM haptic.
I read in the site that "For older Simsonn pedals user: Simsonn Pro Pedal
and Pro Plus Pedal users should purchase the Plus X Control Box"

Do I have to use the old and the new Box, or the Plus X Control Box can
handle my current pedal?

Many thanks in advance.
Best regards,

José Alves

conversations.body_text: Hi José Alves,    The Plus X Control Box can be used with the Pro Plus pedal, so only one Plus X Control Box is needed to connect everything.

Thank you for the clarification.

On Fri, Aug 29, 2025 at 10:19 AM service@simsonn.com
